          <title>
            <string language="sl">Uporaba elektrike</string>
            <string language="en">Using electricity</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Oglej si tokovne kroge. Če misliš, da bo žarnica svetila, jo pobarvaj rumeno in v okvirček nariši ...</string>
            <string language="en">Pictures of different circuits that include source and bulb.</string>

source et l'ampoule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>

          <description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνες των διαφορετικών κυκλωμάτων που περιλαμβάνουν

            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuadros de diversos circuitos que incluyen fuente
y el bulbo.</string>
